mapper.update: update sys_resource set parent_id = #{parentId} WHERE type = #{type.value} and resource_id = #{resourceId} and delete_state = 0
mapper.select:
select sr.id as id, sr.parent_id as parentId, sr.type as type, sr.resource_id as resourceId, s.name as name, s.typeName as typeName from sys_resource sr LEFT JOIN ( select concat('1_', ss.id) as id , ss.name, ss.sort, sd.label as typeName from sys_system ss left join sys_dict sd on ss.type = sd.value and sd.delete_state = 0 where ss.delete_state = 0
UNION ALL
select concat('2_', id) as id , name, sort, '' as typeName from sys_menu where delete_state = 0
UNION ALL
select concat('3_', id) as id , name, 0 as sort, '' as typeName from sys_button where delete_state = 0 ) s on s.id = concat(concat(type, '_'), resource_id) WHERE sr.type <= ${type.value} and sr.delete_state = 0 order by s.sort

select * from ( select sr.id, sr.parent_id, '' as name, '' as icon, '' as path, '' as component, '0' as is_index, '0' as show_type, 0 as sort, '' as role_code from sys_system ss LEFT JOIN sys_resource sr on sr.resource_id = ss.id and sr.type = 1 WHERE ss.delete_state = 0
UNION ALL
SELECT sr.id, sr.parent_id, sm.name, sm.icon, sm.path, sm.component, sm.is_index, sm.show_type, sm.sort, srole.code as role_code FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_resource sr on sr.resource_id = sm.id and sr.type = 2 LEFT JOIN sys_role_resource srr on srr.resource_id = sr.id LEFT JOIN sys_role srole on srole.id = srr.role_id WHERE sm.delete_state = 0 ) t ORDER BY t.sort desc
